title: Galleria/ Uptown REDUCED Monthly Rent
posting_body: For leasing information call or text
Perfectly situated on the corner of Woodway Drive and South Post Oak Lane, we exude French chateau-style charm in a prime Tanglewood location.

Discover a world away in the middle of it all at the only boutique Woodway apartments with just 102 residences framed by mature live oaks and magnolia trees that surround a beautifully landscaped central courtyard with shaded pergola and private resort style pool.

Best yet, these Tanglewood Houston apartments are just minutes to 1,500 acres of recreation at Memorial Park and another thousand acres of shopping, dining, and entertainment at the world-famous Galleria.
